lead_paragraph: Breckenridge Brewery, one of Colorado’s largest and oldest craft breweries, is promising that nothing will change even though it is being bought by Anheuser-Busch InBev.

headline.main: Anheuser-Busch Inbev Buys Large Colorado Craft Brewery
headline.print_headline: Anheuser-Busch Inbev Buys Large Colorado Craft Brewery

snippet: Breckenridge Brewery, one of Colorado’s largest and oldest craft breweries, is promising that nothing will change even though it is being bought by Anheuser-Busch InBev.
